text: Act of Violence is a 1956 television play broadcast by the British Broadcasting Corporation. It was later remade as an Australian television play in 1959. ==Cast== *Andrée Melly - Lenora *Keith Michell - The Man *Ewen Solon - Inspektor Frink *Leonard Sachs - Professor Kroz *Diana Lambert - Katina Kroz *Philip Stainton - Vent *Peter Swanwick - General Zuglin ==References== ==External links== * Category:British television plays Category:English- language television shows Category:British live television shows Category:1956 television plays Category:British films
title: Act of Violence (1956 film)
